actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A concurrent resolution extending an invitation to the International Olympic Committee to hold the 1998 winter Olympic games in Salt Lake City, Utah, and pledging the cooperation and support of the Congress of the United States.

summary.text: Advises the International Olympic Committee that the United States Congress would welcome the holding of the 1998 winter Olympic games in Salt Lake City, Utah. Expresses the hope of the Congress that Salt Lake City, Utah, will be selected for the site for the 1998 winter Olympic games, and pledges its cooperation and support of their successful fulfillment.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution extending an invitation to the International Olympic Committee to hold the 1998 winter Olympic games in Salt Lake City, Utah, and pledging the cooperation and support of the Congress of the United States.
